item.title: ðŸ“‰ What lessons should one learn from the Gliffy outage?
item.description: Ever since the recent lengthy and complete outage of Gliffy, I have been thinking about how I could (should that be a should?) protect myself when working with SaaS. Everything is sorted now and Gliffy have a post explaining a bit more detail on the outage. One of the takeaways from that being disaster recovery plans should probably be practiced more often.
